61#define AM_APOLLO3_MCUCTRL 1
62
63//*****************************************************************************
64//
66//
67//*****************************************************************************
68#define APOLLO3P \
69 ((MCUCTRL->CHIPREV & \
70 (MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_Msk | MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_Msk)) == \
71 (_VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_C) | \
72 _VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_REV0)))
73
74#define APOLLO3_B0 \
75 ((MCUCTRL->CHIPREV & \
76 (MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_Msk | MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_Msk)) == \
77 (_VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_B) | \
78 _VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_REV0)))
79
80#define APOLLO3_A1 \
81 ((MCUCTRL->CHIPREV & \
82 (MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_Msk | MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_Msk)) == \
83 (_VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_A) | \
84 _VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_REV1)))
85
86#define APOLLO3_A0 \
87 ((MCUCTRL->CHIPREV & \
88 (MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_Msk | MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_Msk)) == \
89 (_VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_A) | \
90 _VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_REV0)))
91
92//
94//
95#define APOLLO3_GE_B0 \
96 ((MCUCTRL->CHIPREV & \
97 (MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_Msk | MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_Msk)) >= \
98 (_VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_B) | \
99 _VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_REV0)))
100
101#define APOLLO3_GE_A1 \
102 ((MCUCTRL->CHIPREV & \
103 (MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_Msk | MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_Msk)) >= \
104 (_VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_A) | \
105 _VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_REV1)))
106

113#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_FLASH_SIZE_N ((MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_PARTNUM_FLASHSIZE_M >> MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_PARTNUM_FLASHSIZE_S) + 1)
114#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_SRAM_SIZE_N ((MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_PARTNUM_SRAMSIZE_M >> MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_PARTNUM_SRAMSIZE_S) + 1)

125{
126 AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_CONTROL_FAULT_CAPTURE_ENABLE,
127 AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_CONTROL_FAULT_CAPTURE_DISABLE,

129 AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_CONTROL_EXTCLK32K_DISABLE,

143//**************************************
168//**************************************
169#define SRAM_NOPREFETCH_Pos 16
170#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SRAM_PREFETCH_INSTR (MCUCTRL_SRAMMODE_IPREFETCH_Msk << 0)
171#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SRAM_PREFETCH_INSTRCACHE (MCUCTRL_SRAMMODE_IPREFETCH_CACHE_Msk << 0)
172#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SRAM_PREFETCH_DATA (MCUCTRL_SRAMMODE_DPREFETCH_Msk << 0)
173#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SRAM_PREFETCH_DATACACHE (MCUCTRL_SRAMMODE_DPREFETCH_CACHE_Msk << 0)
174#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SRAM_NOPREFETCH_INSTR (MCUCTRL_SRAMMODE_IPREFETCH_Msk << SRAM_NOPREFETCH_Pos)
175#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SRAM_NOPREFETCH_INSTRCACHE (MCUCTRL_SRAMMODE_IPREFETCH_CACHE_Msk << SRAM_NOPREFETCH_Pos)
176#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SRAM_NOPREFETCH_DATA (MCUCTRL_SRAMMODE_DPREFETCH_Msk << SRAM_NOPREFETCH_Pos)
177#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SRAM_NOPREFETCH_DATACACHE (MCUCTRL_SRAMMODE_DPREFETCH_CACHE_Msk << SRAM_NOPREFETCH_Pos)

279am_hal_mcuctrl_fault_t;

281//**************************************
283//**************************************
284typedef struct
285{
286 bool bBurstAck; // FEATUREENABLE
287 bool bBLEAck; // "
288 bool bDebuggerLockout; // DEBUGGER
289 bool bADCcalibrated; // ADCCAL
290 bool bBattLoadEnabled; // ADCBATTLOAD
291 uint8_t bSecBootOnWarmRst; // BOOTLOADER
292 uint8_t bSecBootOnColdRst; // "
293} am_hal_mcuctrl_status_t;
294
295//**************************************
297//**************************************
298typedef struct
299{
300 bool bBurstAvail; // FEATUREENABLE
301 bool bBLEavail; // "
302 bool bBLEFeature; // SKU
303 bool bBurstFeature; // "
304 uint8_t ui8SecBootFeature; // BOOTLOADER
305} am_hal_mcuctrl_feature_t;
